description.en:
What is PluraCoin?
PluraCoin [PLURA] is a digital cryptocurrency based on CryptoNote technology with a vision to bring cryptocurrencies to people's daily life. The name "PluraCoin" is derived from latin word "plura", that comes for english term "many".

That perfectly describes our mission to bring digital cryptocurrencies closer to the common people, not only IT professionals or computer enthusiasts. We'd like to interest as many people as possible and let them earn/mine as many PluraCoins as needed in as many real world applications as possible.

With PluraCoin, you can send instant, private, near-zero cost payments to anyone in the world. You can spend safely - nobody can see your balances or activity.

Why PluraCoin?
Quick Payment Method
Enables the transfer of value across an accessible network ecosystem that is secure, flexible and scalable.

Highly Private
Complete anonymity and privacy using cryptographic technology ring signatures.

Untraceable
Transactions on the PluraCoin blockchain cannot be linked to a particular user or real-world identity.

Decentralized
PluraCoin follows vision of a secure digital cash operated by a network of users.

Roadmap
Q1 2018 - The story of PLURA begins
PluraCoin has been launched as stable platform for future development along with a complex set of support tools like GUI / CLI / offline wallets, block explorer, official mining pool and web miner. A public campaign has been started on major channels like Twitter, Facebook, Discord, Reddit and Bitcointalk. PluraCoin has been sucessfully listed on crypto exchanges Stocks.Exchange and TradeOgre.

Q2 2018 - Core and business development
Improvements to the existing system to strenghten system stability. Windows / OS X miner easy web configurator (Click & mine). White paper. Light wallet. Masternodes

Q3 2018 - MyPLURA and other exchanges
A Web wallet project MyPLURA. New markets for PLURA.

Q4 2018 - eCommerce Integration
Cart payment plugins for popular open source ecommerce solutions. Partnership on real world products / services with selected partners
